I. Question: Why are you a Catholic? The answer follows. II. Question: But why are you a Protestant? An answer attempted (in vain) / written by the Reverend Father S.C. Monk of the Holy Order of St. Benedict ... Cressy, Serenus, 1605-1674. Cressy, Serenus, 1605-1674. Why are you a Catholic?
[4], 72 p.
[s.n.], London : 1686.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
